name: enrollment_updated
definition: The event is emitted anytime an enrollment record is updated by an end user or API request. Only changes to the fields included in the body of the event payload will emit the `updated` event.
trigger: Triggered when a course enrollment is modified.

data[0].group.extensions[\"com.instructu.context_type: Canvas context type where the action took place e.g context_type = Course.

data[0].object.extensions[\"com.instruct.course_id: The Canvas id of the course for this enrollment
data[0].object.extensions[\"com.instruct.course_section_id: The id of the section of the course for the new enrollment
data[0].object.extensions[\"com.instruct.entity_id: Canvas global ID of the object affected by the event
data[0].object.extensions[\"com.instruct.limit_privileges_to_course_section: Whether students can only talk to students within their course section
data[0].object.extensions[\"com.instruct.type: The type of enrollment; e.g. StudentEnrollment, TeacherEnrollment, ObserverEnrollment, etc.
data[0].object.extensions[\"com.instruct.user_id: The Canvas id of the currently logged in user
data[0].object.extensions[\"com.instruct.user_name: The user first and last name
data[0].object.extensions[\"com.instruct.workflow_state:
1. Workflow state of the assignment when used in the assignment context (deleted, duplicating, failed_to_import, failed_to_duplicate, failed_to_migrate, importing, published, unpublished)
2. Workflow state of the enrollment when used in the enrollment context (active, completed, creation_pending, deleted, inactive, invited)

com.instructure.canvas.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
